page.title: 02GENERAL INTRODUCTION 2
page.content: Through this section,runs a regular bus service between Bolton and Chorley in addition to the regular service between Horwich and Bolton.There are three request stops in this area. There is only one public house _ The Jolly Crofters _ and one Post Office close by. In an area , known by the name of Ridgemont,there is an an open space used as a park and playing fields. Very close by,in New Chapel Lane,there is a Methodist Chapel. Our school-Horwich Parish C.E.is situated on Chorley Old Rd. an extremely busy through road.
